button.uploadDocuments.description: Button text to allow user to upload documents

field.createdAt.description: Time when the document was uploaded

message.introductionForKnowledge.message: Documents can be added to the knowledge base, and the robot can use the knowledge from the knowledge base when replying.
message.introductionForKnowledge.description: Introduction information for the knowledge base

message.introductionForRepository.message: The knowledge base is a collection of documents, and you can add documents to it. When the robot responds, it will reply from the documents in the knowledge base.
message.introductionForRepository.description: Introduction information for the knowledge base

message.uploadDocumentsExceed.message: Exceeded the limit for uploading documents
message.uploadDocumentsExceed.description: Error message when the limit for uploading documents is exceeded

message.uploadDocumentsError.description: Error message when the document upload fails

message.uploadDocumentsSuccess.description: Success message when the document is uploaded successfully

message.createDocumentSuccess.description: Success message when the document is created successfully

message.startCreateDocument.description: Information when starting to process the document

message.createDocumentError.description: Error message when the document processing fails

message.dragOrClickToUpload.message: Drag or click to upload documents
message.dragOrClickToUpload.description: Information for dragging or clicking to upload documents

message.startNewChat.description: Information for starting a new chat

message.errorApiError.message: Request failed, please try again later
message.errorApiError.description: Error message when the request fails

message.errorBadRequest.message: Incorrect request format, please rephrase your question
message.errorBadRequest.description: Error message when the request format is incorrect

message.errorNoConversation.message: The conversation content does not exist or has expired, please start a new conversation
message.errorNoConversation.description: Error message when the conversation content does not exist or has expired

message.errorContentTooLarge.message: Question content is too long, please shorten and try again
message.errorContentTooLarge.description: Error message when the question content is too long

message.errorTooManyRequests.message: Your operation is too frequent, please try again later
message.errorTooManyRequests.description: Error message when the operation is too frequent

message.errorUsedUp.message: Your package usage has reached the limit, please purchase more usage to continue
message.errorUsedUp.description: Error message when the package usage has reached the limit

message.errorUnknown.message: Unknown server error occurred, please try again later or contact customer service
message.errorUnknown.description: Error message when an unknown server error occurs

message.errorTimeout.message: Answering the question timed out, please try again later
message.errorTimeout.description: Error message when the question answering times out

message.errorNotApplied.message: You have not applied for this service, please apply before continuing to ask
message.errorNotApplied.description: Error message when the user has not applied for the service

message.howToUse.message: Press Shift+Enter to create a new line
message.howToUse.description: Information on how to create a new line

message.createRepositorySuccess.description: Success message when the knowledge base is created successfully

message.createRepositoryFailed.message: Failed to create the knowledge base
message.createRepositoryFailed.description: Error message when the knowledge base creation fails

message.deleteRepositorySuccess.description: Success message when the knowledge base is deleted successfully

message.deleteDocumentSuccess.description: Success message when the document is deleted successfully

message.currentRepository.description: Displays information about the current knowledge base

message.nameRequired.description: Error message when the name is required but not provided

message.inputRepositoryName.description: Input placeholder for the knowledge base name

message.inputRepositoryDescription.message: Describe your repository in one sentence

message.supportedFiles.description: Information displaying the supported file types

title.repositories.description: Title for the list of repositories
